name: Dress To Impress (itch) (OpenDoresGaming)
description:
Fred needs your help picking his outfit for the day.
Use the keys 1 - 2 - 3 on your keyboard to select Fred's clothes and send him on his way. you get 7 tries to find what he wants to wear, otherwise he goes out naked!

(This game is a bit like Mastermind, only easier and with stickmen)

CONTROLS:

1 - Change head

2- Change shirt

3- Change pants

Side note: the solution to each level always stays the same, so if you have to start over, don't worry!
